productIdea: An agentic system that creates a set of documents describing digital product creation from scratch to the final launch.

discoveryDocument.productSummary: Discovery summary for: An agentic system that creates a set of documents describing digital product creation from scratch to the final launch.. Target user hint: Non-technical subject matter experts.. This draft was generated without the LLM and should be reviewed.
